trans-unit.source: How To: Create or Modify a Service Namespace
trans-unit.target: How To: Create or Modify a Service Namespace

trans-unit.source: How To: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace
trans-unit.target: How To: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to create a new <token>sb2</token> <token>servicensd</token> using the <token>azure_2</token> management portal, and how to modify an existing <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to create a new <token>sb2</token> <token>servicensd</token> using the <token>azure_2</token> management portal, and how to modify an existing <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: You can create one or more <token>servicensd</token>s in your <token>sb2</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can create one or more <token>servicensd</token>s in your <token>sb2</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: To create a <token>sb2</token> <token>servicensd</token>
trans-unit.target: To create a <token>sb2</token> <token>servicensd</token>

trans-unit.source: Open a browser and visit the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=254685</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Open a browser and visit the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=254685</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Log on to the Web site using a Microsoft Account (MSA).
trans-unit.target: Log on to the Web site using a Microsoft Account (MSA).

trans-unit.source: If you do not have an MSA, click <ui>Sign up</ui> to create one for yourself.
trans-unit.target: If you do not have an MSA, click <ui>Sign up</ui> to create one for yourself.

trans-unit.source: After you are signed in, you are redirected to the Management Portal page.
trans-unit.target: After you are signed in, you are redirected to the Management Portal page.

trans-unit.source: In the left pane navigation, click <ui>Service Bus</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In the left pane navigation, click <ui>Service Bus</ui>.

trans-unit.source: To add a new <token>servicensd</token>, click <ui>Create</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To add a new <token>servicensd</token>, click <ui>Create</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you have not yet created any <token>servicensd</token>s, you can click <ui>Create a New Namespace</ui> in the main portal window.
trans-unit.target: Or, if you have not yet created any <token>servicensd</token>s, you can click <ui>Create a New Namespace</ui> in the main portal window.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Add a new Namespace</ui> box, type a name for your new <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Add a new Namespace</ui> box, type a name for your new <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: Note that each <token>servicensd</token> must be globally unique so that it can be identified by the service.
trans-unit.target: Note that each <token>servicensd</token> must be globally unique so that it can be identified by the service.

trans-unit.source: When you type a name for your <token>servicensd</token>, the portal checks to see if the name is unique and valid.
trans-unit.target: When you type a name for your <token>servicensd</token>, the portal checks to see if the name is unique and valid.

trans-unit.source: If so, a green check mark appears to indicate that the name is valid.
trans-unit.target: If so, a green check mark appears to indicate that the name is valid.

trans-unit.source: You can also choose the type of messaging entities this namespace will contain: <embeddedLabel>Messaging</embeddedLabel> (queues, topics/subscriptions, event hubs), or <embeddedLabel>Notification Hub</embeddedLabel>, as well as the messaging tier in which the namespace is created (<embeddedLabel>Basic</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>Standard</embeddedLabel>).
trans-unit.target: You can also choose the type of messaging entities this namespace will contain: <embeddedLabel>Messaging</embeddedLabel> (queues, topics/subscriptions, event hubs), or <embeddedLabel>Notification Hub</embeddedLabel>, as well as the messaging tier in which the namespace is created (<embeddedLabel>Basic</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>Standard</embeddedLabel>).

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> the <externalLink><linkText>Service Bus pricing guide</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/service-bus/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> the <externalLink><linkText>Service Bus pricing guide</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/service-bus/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You do not have to use the same <token>servicensd</token> for both client and service applications.
trans-unit.target: You do not have to use the same <token>servicensd</token> for both client and service applications.

trans-unit.source: Choose a region in the available dropdown.
trans-unit.target: Choose a region in the available dropdown.

trans-unit.source: Then click the <ui>OK</ui> check mark.
trans-unit.target: Then click the <ui>OK</ui> check mark.

trans-unit.source: The system creates your <token>servicensd</token> and enables it.
trans-unit.target: The system creates your <token>servicensd</token> and enables it.

trans-unit.source: Until it is active, its status in the list is set to <ui>Activating</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Until it is active, its status in the list is set to <ui>Activating</ui>.

trans-unit.source: You might have to wait several minutes as the system provisions resources for your account.
trans-unit.target: You might have to wait several minutes as the system provisions resources for your account.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the security credentials for a <token>servicensd</token>
trans-unit.target: To obtain the security credentials for a <token>servicensd</token>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the Shared Access Signature (SAS) credentials associated with a <token>servicensd</token>, click the <token>servicensd</token> in the list, and then click <ui>Connection Information</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To obtain the Shared Access Signature (SAS) credentials associated with a <token>servicensd</token>, click the <token>servicensd</token> in the list, and then click <ui>Connection Information</ui>.

trans-unit.source: You can also obtain the configuration <externalLink><linkText>connection string</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=266507</linkUri></externalLink> associated with the <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: You can also obtain the configuration <externalLink><linkText>connection string</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=266507</linkUri></externalLink> associated with the <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: You can copy and paste these values from the <ui>Access connection information</ui> dialog into any application that requires these credentials.
trans-unit.target: You can copy and paste these values from the <ui>Access connection information</ui> dialog into any application that requires these credentials.

trans-unit.source: <token>crabout</token> SAS, see <link xlink:href="50b1618e-6013-466d-8f9f-ee2c1371bb13" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Authentication</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crabout</token> SAS, see <link xlink:href="50b1618e-6013-466d-8f9f-ee2c1371bb13" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Authentication</link>.

trans-unit.source: To modify an existing <token>servicensd</token>
trans-unit.target: To modify an existing <token>servicensd</token>

trans-unit.source: After you’ve created a namespace, you can create or modify Shared Access Signature (SAS) policies and keys for that namespace.
trans-unit.target: After you’ve created a namespace, you can create or modify Shared Access Signature (SAS) policies and keys for that namespace.

trans-unit.source: SAS policies are useful for granting <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel>, <embeddedLabel>Send</embeddedLabel>, and <embeddedLabel>Listen</embeddedLabel> rights on a given namespace.
trans-unit.target: SAS policies are useful for granting <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel>, <embeddedLabel>Send</embeddedLabel>, and <embeddedLabel>Listen</embeddedLabel> rights on a given namespace.

trans-unit.source: In the list of namespaces, click the <embeddedLabel>Namespace Name</embeddedLabel> field for the namespace you want to modify.
trans-unit.target: In the list of namespaces, click the <embeddedLabel>Namespace Name</embeddedLabel> field for the namespace you want to modify.

trans-unit.source: Click the <embeddedLabel>Configure</embeddedLabel> tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the <embeddedLabel>Configure</embeddedLabel> tab.

trans-unit.source: Create or modify policies in the <embeddedLabel>Shared Access Policies</embeddedLabel> section, or copy/regenerate SAS keys in the <embeddedLabel>Shared Access Key Generator</embeddedLabel> section.
trans-unit.target: Create or modify policies in the <embeddedLabel>Shared Access Policies</embeddedLabel> section, or copy/regenerate SAS keys in the <embeddedLabel>Shared Access Key Generator</embeddedLabel> section.

trans-unit.source: Click the <embeddedLabel>Scale</embeddedLabel> tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the <embeddedLabel>Scale</embeddedLabel> tab.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Capacity</embeddedLabel> section, you can change the billing tier for this namespace.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Capacity</embeddedLabel> section, you can change the billing tier for this namespace.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <externalLink><linkText>Service Bus Pricing</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/service-bus/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <externalLink><linkText>Service Bus Pricing</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/service-bus/</linkUri></externalLink>.
